pg133_img1_e0327a.png:
\[
\begin{aligned}
\frac{P_{2}}{T_{2}} &= \frac{P_{3}}{T_{3}} \\
T_{3} &= T_{2} \times \frac{P_{3}}{P_{2}} = 874.1 \times \frac{68}{21.67} = 2742.9 \text{ K. (Ans.)}
\end{aligned}
\]

Heat added at constant volume
\[
= c_{v} (T_{3} - T_{2}) = 0.71 (2742.9 - 874.1) = 1326.8 \text{ kJ/kg}
\]

Heat added at constant pressure
\[
\begin{aligned}
&= \text{Total heat added} - \text{Heat added at constant volume} \\
&= 1750 - 1326.8 = 423.2 \text{ kJ/kg} \\
c_{p}(T_{4} - T_{3}) &= 423.2 \\
1.0(T_{4} - 2742.9) &= 423.2 \\
T_{4} &= 3166 \text{ K. (Ans.)}
\end{aligned}
\]

For constant pressure process 3-4,
\[
\rho = \frac{V_{4}}{V_{3}} = \frac{T_{4}}{T_{3}} = \frac{3166}{2742.9} = 1.15
\]

For adiabatic (or isentropic) process 4-5,
\[
\frac{V_{5}}{V_{4}} = \frac{V_{5}}{V_{4}} \times \frac{V_{2}}{V_{2}} = \frac{V_{1}}{V_{2}} \times \frac{V_{3}}{V_{4}} = \frac{r}{\rho} \qquad \left(\because \rho = \frac{V_{4}}{V_{3}} \right)
\]
Also
\[
p_{4}V_{4}^{\gamma} = p_{5}V_{5}^{\gamma}
\]
\[
p_{5} = p_{4} \times \left(\frac{V_{4}}{V_{5}}\right)^{\gamma} = 68 \times \left(\frac{\rho}{r}\right)^{\gamma} = 68 \times \left(\frac{1.15}{9}\right)^{1.4} = 3.81 \text{ bar. (Ans.)}
\]

Again,
\[
\frac{T_{5}}{T_{4}} = \left(\frac{V_{4}}{V_{5}}\right)^{\gamma - 1} = \left(\frac{\rho}{r}\right)^{\gamma - 1} = \left(\frac{1.15}{9}\right)^{1.4 - 1} = 0.439
\]
\[
T_{5} = T_{4} \times 0.439 = 3166 \times 0.439 = 1389.8 \text{ K. (Ans.)}
\]
pg136_img2_30de14.png:
\[
\begin{array}{l}
\text{Total amount of fuel added} = \frac{0.0084}{21} = 0.0004 \text{ kg} \\
\text{Quantity of fuel added during the process 3-4,} \\
= 0.0004 - 0.000066 = 0.000334 \text{ kg} \\
\text{Heat added during the constant pressure operation 3-4} \\
= 0.000334 \times 43890 = 14.66 \text{ kJ} \\
(0.0084 + 0.0004) c_p (T_4 - T_3) = 14.66 \\
0.0088 \times 1.0 (T_4 - 1620) = 14.66 \\
T_4 = \frac{14.66}{0.0088} + 1620 = 3286 \text{ K or } 3013^\circ \text{C} \\
\frac{V_3}{T_3} = \frac{V_4}{T_4} \text{ or } V_4 = \frac{V_3 T_4}{T_3} = \frac{0.0006 \times 3286}{1620} = 0.001217 \text{ m}^3 \\
\frac{T_4}{T_5} = \left( \frac{V_5}{V_4} \right)^{\gamma - 1} = \left( \frac{0.009}{0.001217} \right)^{1.41 - 1} = 2.27
\end{array}
\]
pg137_img1_cc9607.png:
\[
\begin{aligned}
T_{5} &= \frac{T_{4}}{2.27} = \frac{3286}{2.27} = 1447.5 \, \text{K or } 1174.5^{\circ} \text{C} \\
\text{Heat rejected during constant volume process 5-1,} \\
&= mc_{v} (T_{5} - T_{1}) \\
&= (0.00854 + 0.0004) \times 0.71 (1447.5 - 373) = 6.713 \, \text{kJ} \\
\text{Work done} &= \text{Heat supplied} - \text{Heat rejected} \\
&= (2.898 + 14.66) - 6.713 = 10.845 \, \text{kJ} \\
\therefore \text{Thermal efficiency, } \eta_{th} &= \frac{\text{Work done}}{\text{Heat supplied}} = \frac{10.845}{(2.898 + 14.66)} = 0.6176 \text{ or } 61.76 \% \, \text{(Ans.)}
\end{aligned}
\]
pg139_img1_d92956.png:
\[
\begin{aligned}
\eta_{\text{th,carnot}} &= 1 - \frac{T_{\min}}{T_{\max}} = 1 - \frac{81.33 + 273.15}{300 + 273.15} = 0.3815 \\
\text{The work ratio} &= \frac{\text{net work output}}{\text{gross work output}} = \frac{w_{\text{net,out}}}{w_{\text{gross,out}}} \\
\text{Heat supplied} &= h_2 - h_1 = h_{fg@4\text{MPa}} = 1714.1 \text{ kJ/kg} \\
\eta_{\text{th,carnot}} &= \frac{w_{\text{net,out}} - w_{\text{net,in}}}{\text{gross heat supplied}} = 0.3815 \\
w_{\text{net,out}} - w_{\text{net,in}} &= 0.3815 \times 1714.1 = 653.9 \text{ kJ/kg} \\
\text{That is, the net work output} &= 653.9 \text{ kJ/kg} \\
h_2 &= 2801.4 \text{ kJ/kg and } s_2 = s_3 = 6.0701 \text{ kJ/(kg K)} \\
s_3 &= 6.0701 = s_{f3} + x_3 s_{fg3} = 1.0910 + x_3 (7.5939 - 1.0910) \\
x_3 &= 0.766 \\
h_3 &= h_{f3} + x_3 h_{fg3} = 340.49 + 0.766(2645.9 - 340.49) = 2106.4 \text{ kJ/kg}
\end{aligned}
\]

\begin{aligned}
\Delta T &\propto \Delta P \\
T &\propto P \\
\frac{T}{T_{tp}} &= \frac{P}{P_{tp}} \\
T &= 273.16 \frac{P}{P_{tp}} \\
T &= 273.16 \lim_{P_{tp} \to 0} \left[ \frac{P}{P_{tp}} \right]
\end{aligned}
\]

pg32_img1_843609.png:
\[
\begin{aligned}
V_2 &= 10 \text{ m/s}, z_2 = 50 \text{ m}, h_2 = 2900 \text{ kJ/kg} \\
W_{12} &= 5 \text{ kW} = 5 \text{ kJ/s} \\
w &= \frac{W_{12}}{\dot{m}} = \frac{5}{0.7} = 7.143 \text{ kJ/kg} \\
q + h_1 + \frac{V_1^2}{2} + gz_1 &= h_2 + \frac{V_2^2}{2} + gz_2 + w \\
q &= (h_2 - h_1) + \left( \frac{V_2^2 - V_1^2}{2} \right) + (z_2 - z_1)g + w \\
&= (2900 - 2700) + \left( \frac{10^2 - 40^2}{2} \right) \times 10^{-3} + (50 - 25) \times 9.81 \times 10^{-3} + 7.143 \\
&= 206.64 \text{ kJ/kg} \\
\text{Total heat transferred} &= 206.64 \times 0.7 = 144.65 \text{ kW}
\end{aligned}
\]

pg44_img1_dc37e3.png:
\[
\oint \frac{\delta Q}{T} = \int_{1A}^{2A} \frac{\delta Q}{T} + \int_{2B}^{1B} \frac{\delta Q}{T} = 0 \tag{3.21}
\]
\[
\oint \frac{\delta Q}{T} = \int_{1A}^{2A} \frac{\delta Q}{T} + \int_{2C}^{1C} \frac{\delta Q}{T} < 0 \tag{3.22}
\]
\[
\int_{2B}^{1B} \frac{\delta Q}{T} > \int_{2C}^{1C} \frac{\delta Q}{T}
\]
\[
\int_{2B}^{1B} \frac{\delta Q}{T} = \int_{2B}^{1B} dS = \int_{2C}^{1C} dS
\]
\[
\int_{2C}^{1C} dS > \int_{2C}^{1C} \frac{\delta Q}{T}
\]
\[
dS \geq \frac{\delta Q}{T}
\]
\[
S_2 - S_1 \geq \int_1^2 \frac{\delta Q}{T} \tag{3.23}
\]
\[
dS = \frac{\delta Q}{T}
\]
\[
dS > \frac{\delta Q}{T}
\]

\begin{aligned}
& dS_{\text {isolated system }} \geq 0 \\
& dS_{\text {isolated system }}=d S_{\text {system }}+d S_{\text {surroundings }}=d S_{\text {gen }} \\
& d S_{\text {gen }}=d S_{\text {system }}+d S_{\text {surroundings }} \geq 0 \text { or } S_{\text {gen }}=\Delta S_{\text {system }}+\Delta S_{\text {surroundings }} \geq 0 \\
& \Delta S_{\text {system }}=\left(S_{2}-S_{1}\right)_{\text {system }}=m\left(s_{2}-s_{1}\right) \\
& \Delta S_{\text {surroundings }}=\frac{Q_{\text {surroundings }}}{T_{\text {surroundings }}} \\
& \Delta S_{c v}=\left(S_{2}-S_{1}\right)_{c v} \\
& \Delta S_{\text {surroundings }}=\frac{Q_{\text {surroundings }}}{T_{\text {surroundings }}}+S_{e}-S_{i}
\end{aligned}
\]

pg59_img1_9e4fb2.png:
\[
\begin{aligned}
\delta Q &= dU + \delta W \\
\delta Q &= T \, dS \quad \text{and} \quad \delta W = p \, dV \\
T \, dS &= dU + p \, dV \quad (3.85) \\
H &= U + pV \\
dH &= dU + p \, dV + V \, dp \\
dH &= T \, dS + V \, dp \\
T \, dS &= dH - V \, dp \quad (3.86) \\
T \, ds &= du + p \, dv \quad (3.87a) \\
T \, ds &= dh - v \, dp \quad (3.87b)
\end{aligned}
\]
pg60_img1_8a01c7.png:
\[
\Delta s = C_p \ln \left( \frac{v_2}{v_1} \right) + C_v \ln \left( \frac{P_2}{P_1} \right)
\]
\[
ds = \left( \frac{\partial s}{\partial T} \right)_P dT + \left( \frac{\partial s}{\partial P} \right)_T dP
\]
\[
ds = \left( \frac{\partial s}{\partial T} \right)_v dT + \left( \frac{\partial s}{\partial v} \right)_T dv
\]
\[
ds = \left( \frac{\partial s}{\partial P} \right)_v dP + \left( \frac{\partial s}{\partial v} \right)_P dv
\]
\[
C_P = T \left( \frac{\partial s}{\partial T} \right)_P
\]
\[
C_v = T \left( \frac{\partial s}{\partial T} \right)_v
\]
\[
\left( \frac{\partial T}{\partial v} \right)_s = - \left( \frac{\partial P}{\partial s} \right)_v
\]

\[
\begin{aligned}
dh &= du + Pdv + vdP \quad \text{or} \quad dH = dU + Pdv + VdP \\
dh &= Tds + vdP \quad \text{or} \quad dH = TdS + VdP \\
a &= u - Ts \quad \text{or} \quad A = U - TS \\
dA &= dU - TdS - SdT \quad \text{or} \quad da = du - Tds - sdT \\
dA &= -PdV - SdT \quad \text{or} \quad da = -Pdv - sdT \\
G &= H - TS \quad \text{or} \quad g = h - Ts
\end{aligned}
\]
